description.value:
The zombie is covered in pustules that rupture when it takes any piercing damage or any critical hit.

Adjacent creatures are hit with vile fluid, causing them to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} unless they succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:|name:Disgusting Pustules] save against the moderate spell DC for the zombie's level.
